text: Anagema higeno'a, Israeli vahe kini ne'mo'a amanage huno hu'ne, Ra Anumzamofo antahintahima erisunana mago kasnampa nera Imla nemofo Mikaia'a mani'ne. Hianagi nagra nagote'nentoa nere. Na'ankure agra knare kasanampa kea nosianki, havi kasnampa kege nagritera hutere nehie. Anagema higeno'a, Jehosafeti'a amanage huno hu'ne, kini ne'moka e'inagea osunka na'ane agra hugahifi antahisu'e.
